markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Hulk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3252)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These towering horrors rise from monstrous, gigantic corpses.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zombie_Hulk.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Zombie Hulk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3252)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=782" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 357 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +12 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 160
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Weaknesses**
slashing 10, vitality 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hunk of meat +17 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
corpse +17 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning

**Corpse Throwing**   A zombie hulk can throw Medium or smaller corpses at foes. They can also throw Medium or smaller zombies for this purpose, who take just as much damage as the target they hit. A zombie that survives being thrown falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88).

**Wide Swing** <actions string="Single Action" />  The zombie hulk makes two hunk of meat Strikes against different targets within its reach.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-487" />
name: Zombie Hulk

text: Zombie Hulk These towering horrors rise from monstrous, gigantic corpses. Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Zombie Hulk Source Monster Core pg. 357 1.1 Perception +8; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +18 Str +7 Dex -1 Con +4 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -2 Slow A zombie is permanently slowed 1 and can't use reactions. --- AC 21 Fort +16 Ref +9 Will +12 HP 160 (void healing) Immunities bleed, death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Weaknesses slashing 10, vitality 10 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action hunk of meat +17 (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10+9 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action corpse +17 (Brutal, range increment 30 feet), Damage 2d6+9 bludgeoning Corpse Throwing A zombie hulk can throw Medium or smaller corpses at foes. They can also throw Medium or smaller zombies for this purpose, who take just as much damage as the target they hit. A zombie that survives being thrown falls prone. Wide Swing Single Action The zombie hulk makes two hunk of meat Strikes against different targets within its reach.
